description: {"blocks":[{"key":"47i87","text":"Autofluorescence QC is performed prior to collecting on-tissue AF. Fluorescence intensity can be tracked for each fluorescence channel (DAPI, EGFP, and DsRed), allowing the microscope performance and the LED light source to be benchmarked and tracked over time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: VU Biomolecular Multimodal Imaging Center / Spraggins Research Group

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"1th60","text":"StarLight Calibration Slides (Bang Laboratories) - Glacial Blue (SL1GB), Dragon Green (SL1DG), Envy Green (SL1EG)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ti45","text":"Zeiss AxioScan Z1 Microscope","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1fe0j","text":"Fluorescence QC is collected prior to any on-tissue AF collection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1464p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9ro1","text":"Use fluorescence calibration slides - StarLight Calibration Slides - Bang Laboratories ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4u9ou","text":"DAPI (excitation-360nm, emission-450nm), Dragon green (excitation-480nm, emission-520nm), and Envy green (excitation-525nm, emission-565nm) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9kejs","text":"Load calibration slides into Zeiss AxioScan.Z1 slide scanner","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fu7s8","text":"Select the same ~ 25 x 25 mm square region in each calibration slide","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4r5hd","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e24th","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9p24o","text":"To reproducibly sample the exact region each time, the square region can be saved as a \"region of interest\", which can be imported for each slide.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cpdrn","text":"Acquire fluorescence microscopy data for each calibration slide.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3gjs9","text":" set-up and relative ranges:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":7,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"anaak","text":"DAPI QC: DAPI (ex. 360 nm, em. QC: Dragon Green (ex. 480 nm, em. 520 nm) Calibration Slide","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fkj4","text":"    LED Light: 475 nm","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ba52d","text":"    Light Source Intensity: 90% ms","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fsi3j","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":8,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"bbjef","text":"DsRed {"blocks":[{"key":"d4m4n","text":"Data Analysis:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f71lu","text":"Once data are collected, background pixels are subtracted, and the average intensity of each channel is calculated and monitored over time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
